Class GUIFrame

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container

              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      View.GUIFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, InvalidInputListener, Log
public class GUIFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, Log, java.lang.Runnable, InvalidInputListener

Gui of the Calculation program. Supports tabs for controlling parameters, results and tone maps.

Author:
sebastianzillessen
